name: Sandbar Digital
description:
We are a Central London-based digital design agency with a proven track record of delivering high quality user-centric web and mobile apps.
We provide seamless User Experiences, driven by a strong design team with a devotion to detail. We can provide everything from strategy and identity through to usability flows and user testing.
Our development team use proven scaleable technologies such as Ruby on Rails, AngularJS, Symfony, Python, ExtJS and Django, along with ground-breaking new technologies such as React and Starling for mobile. This allows us to fine tailor technologies on a per-project basis.
Our clients are award-winners and we look to work with progressive businesses to make that extra difference to their online and mobile presence. Our roster is varied, from start-ups through to large-scale eCommerce retailers.Â 
Get in touch today to find out how we can help your business take its online and mobile offering to the next level.
